text: Mikhail Youzhny was the defending champion but chose not to participate. Janko Tipsarević won the title after defeating Li Zhe 6–2, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Category:2017 ATP Challenger Tour Category:Bangkok Challenger II
title: 2017 Bangkok Challenger II – Singles
